text: Tarapara yakhana musa nija sampradaye phire elena ragambita o anutapta abasthaya, takhana balalena, amara anupasthitite tomara amara ki nikrsta pratinidhitbata'i na karecha. Tomara nija para'oyaradegarera hukuma theke ki tarahura kare phelale ebam se takhatigulo chumre phele dilena ebam nijera bha'iyera mathara cula cepe dhare nijera dike tanate lagalena. Bha'i balalena, he amara mayera putra, lokagulo ye amake durbala mane karala ebam amake ye mere phelara upakrama karechila. Sutaram amara upara ara satrudera hasi'o na. Ara amake jalimadera sarite gan'ya karo na.
